casebody.data:
GENERAL SHOE CORPORATION, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 12333. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. March 15, 1956. Bass, Berry & Sims, Nashville, Tenn., Roberts & Mclnnis, Washington, D. C., for appellant. H. Brian Holland, Ellis N. Slack, Washington, D. C., Fred Elledge, Jr., Nashville, Tenn., for appellee.

Before MARTIN, MILLER and STEWART, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of the district* court, 117 F.Supp. 668, is reversed. United States v. Leslie Salt Company, 350 U.S. 383, 76 S.Ct. 416.
